DOC.brief_title: Transcervical Foley Catheter With Without Oxytocin Induction Labor
DOC.detailed_description: Induction labor term pregnancy may challenge , especially patient unfavorable cervical condition . Numerous trail present evidence efficacy trans cervical Foley catheter pre-induction cervical ripening.The purpose present study evaluate possible benefit concurrent IV Oxytocin infusion trans cervical Foley catheter pre-induction cervical ripening .
DOC.criteria: Term pregnancy Medical indication labor induction transcervical Foley catheter Preterm pregnancy Contraindication induction labor transcervical Foley catheter IV Oxytocin : Uterine scar Multiple pregnancy PROM Grandmultiparity Placenta previa marginal placenta Spontaneous uterine contraction ( 3 10 minute ) Vaginal bleed Nonreassuring fetal heart rate
